products.title: Henderson, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

products.title: Richmond, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.

products.description: Their beautiful wooden mississippi range, consists of several striking shades. Compliment you home with natural wood oak shades, go for cool white and cream neutrals or go for something extra special with grey shades. With complimentary components, the range will breath a new look into your home. products.title: Origin Cream Thermal Blackout Roller Blind
products.description: Origin thermal blackout is a 100% polyester fabric, suitable for use throughout the home. Origin blackout has the added benefit of a white thermal blackout backing which not only cuts the light coming into your room but helps keep in the heat. Origin cream thermal blackout roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Eco-friendly Dimout Sandstone Roller Blind
products.description: Cosy, creamy and versatile, this stylish and neutral roller blind may look simple, but it has plenty of practical features to boast about. The eco-friendly dimout sandstone fabric is expertly made from 100% recycled polyester, minimising the carbon footprint of its manufact cosy, creamy and versatile, this stylish and neutral roller blind may look simple, but it has plenty of practical features to boast about.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Vista, Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none of the daintiness, using a durable, heavy gauge aluminium to form its narrow, adjustable slats, which are perforated to let the light softly filter through. Place the magnolia in your kitchen, where it is functional and wipe-clean, and group with mocha browns and brushed silvers.

products.title: Decor, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Cypress Pearl Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a glamorous sparkle to your home with the exquisite cypress pearl vertical blind. With a glowing design etched onto a neutral backdrop, this blind is luxuriously balanced. Glam up your life and give your home the star-spangled treatment it deserves. Team up with silk and add a glamorous sparkle to your home with the exquisite cypress pearl vertical blind.

products.title: Ecostyle Grained Oak Faux Wood
products.description: Ecostyle fauxwood is an elegant range of blinds that come in several colour variations. This golden brown faux wood blind will add the classic look to your space. Faux oak is mid golden brown hue, perfect to pair with conpemporary neutrals within the home. Made from pvc, it's easy to clean and keep fresh. Their reccomended choice for moisture prone spaces, for example bathrooms.
